section: The villagers are furiously angry at you for taking advantage of their goodwill. You are pelted first with rotten fruit, then with cobblestones prised up from the streets. Lose 1-6 Stamina points (the score of one die). If you survive that, you rejoin your ship. The plank is hauled up and you hastily cast off. Lose the title Saviour of Vervayens Isle and .
